statements: SELECT * FROM patient_progress
SELECT intervention_name, progress_notes FROM patient_progress WHERE therapy_session_id = 1
SELECT therapist_name, intervention_name FROM patient_progress WHERE patient_id = 10
SELECT * FROM patient_progress WHERE therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith'
SELECT patient_id, progress_notes FROM patient_progress WHERE intervention_name = 'Physical Therapy'
SELECT * FROM patient_progress WHERE therapy_session_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_name, intervention_name FROM patient_progress WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT therapist_name, intervention_name FROM patient_progress WHERE therapy_session_id = 3 AND intervention_name = 'meditation';
SELECT * FROM patient_progress WHERE progress_notes LIKE '%improvement%';
SELECT therapist_name, intervention_name FROM patient_progress ORDER BY therapist_name ASC, intervention_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM TherapyTechniques WHERE therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT technique_name, description FROM TherapyTechniques WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE age < 40 AND gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM TherapyTechniques WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY technique_name DESC;
SELECT technique_name, therapist_name FROM TherapyTechniques WHERE description LIKE '%pain%' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM TherapyTechniques;
SELECT technique_name, technique_id FROM TherapyTechniques ORDER BY technique_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Interventions WHERE intervention_category = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT intervention_name FROM Interventions WHERE intervention_id = 2;
SELECT patient_id, therapy_id, progress_date FROM PatientProgress WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM TherapyTechniques;
SELECT intervention_name, intervention_category FROM Interventions WHERE intervention_category = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT technique_id, technique_name FROM TherapyTechniques ORDER BY technique_name DESC;
SELECT progress_date, progress_description FROM PatientProgress WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY progress_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Interventions WHERE intervention_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, therapy_type FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, therapist_id FROM patients JOIN therapy_sessions ON patients.patient_id = therapy_sessions.patient_id;
SELECT therapist_name, COUNT(*) AS session_count FROM therapists JOIN therapy_sessions ON therapists.therapist_id = therapy_sessions.therapist_id GROUP BY therapist_name;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, therapy_type FROM patients WHERE therapy_type = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT patient_name, start_date FROM patients ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patients.patient_name, therapy_sessions.session_date FROM patients JOIN therapy_sessions ON patients.patient_id = therapy_sessions.patient_id;

SELECT patients.patient_name, therapists.therapist_name, therapy_sessions.session_notes FROM patients JOIN therapy_sessions ON patients.patient_id = therapy_sessions.patient_id JOIN therapists ON therapy_sessions.therapist_id = therapists.therapist_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM Therapists;
SELECT therapy_name, duration, cost FROM Therapies WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization, contact_number FROM Therapists WHERE specialization IS NOT NULL;
SELECT therapy_name, cost FROM Therapies WHERE duration > 5 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT session_date, notes FROM Sessions WHERE patient_id = 'abc123' AND therapist_id = 'def456';
